item.title: Seguros ramo "n√£o vida"
item.description: Minimo has three menus. +++ Main Menu Sidebar Menu Social Menu Main Menu name: main Main menu is located at the top of the site. Check Hugo&rsquo;s Menus Documentation for information about managing this menu. You can hide the Main Menu using the following option in your config.toml file: [params.settings] hideMainMenu = true Sidebar Menu name: sidebar You can use Sidebar Menu as normal Hugo Menus . [sidebar_menu] .
